original_text: The Jewish leaders saw that Peter and John were not afraid of them. They also knew that they were not special people. They had not been to any school. So the leaders were very surprised about how Peter and John spoke. They understood that Peter and John had been friends with Jesus.
korean_text: 그들이 베드로와 요한이 담대하게 말함을 보고 그들을 본래 학문 없는 범인으로 알았다가 이상히 여기며 또 전에 예수와 함께 있던 줄도 알고

sentences.original_text: that Peter and John were not afraid of them
sentences.korean_translation: 베드로와 요한이 그들을 두려워하지 않았다는 것을

sentences.original_text: that they were not special people
They had not been to any school
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 어떤 학교에도 다닌 적이 없었다

sentences.original_text: So the leaders were very surprised
about how Peter and John spoke
that Peter and John had been friends with Jesus
